snippet: The Rutgers women’s basketball team, in the top 25 again after an off year under Coach C. Vivian Stringer, hosts No. 1 Connecticut on Sunday, and she welcomes the test.
abstract: Rutgers women’s basketball team, in the top 25 again after an off year under coach C Vivian Stringer, prepares to face No 1-ranked Connecticut.
lead_paragraph: The Rutgers women’s basketball team, in the top 25 again after an off year under Coach C. Vivian Stringer, hosts No. 1 Connecticut on Sunday, and she welcomes the test.

headline.main: Rutgers to Test Its Spirit vs. No. 1 UConn
headline.print_headline: Rutgers to Test Its Spirit vs. No. 1 UConn
